name: Witchunter Mugi
description:
A little grindy bullet hell versus 1 boss.

You gain currency for dealing certain amount of damage to the witch. Buy upgrades, spells. That’s kinda it. :)

Help:

  • WASD - move.
  • LMB - first skill.
  • RMB - second skill.
  • Q - third skill.
  • You can see your stats by pressing E. Also you can swap skills there.

When picking up spells from shrines - you need to press what button it should be. (You can swap it later).

The game need some polish, because it was rushed in the end, so post-jam version probably will happen someday.
